item.description:
This is primarily for those who want to become belayer certified. It cost $29 for the training and all the climbing you would like to do. $21 if you have a student or military ID.

Anyone can do it and it is not too difficult. Please come, we would like to have a few certified before sunday. That way we don't have to "rent-a-belayer"

Thanks and c u there ! ..... or at least on Sunday

We are scheduled for training at 7 - we can climb until midnight - come on and get warmed up for Sunday !
item.how_to_find_us: ask for Roger and the Meetup Belayers

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Carabiners - Belayer Certification Training Thursday Night
